name: Paper Plane 3D
description:
Paper Plane is a classic game giving the feel of real beauty
changing environments, colors and much more.

How To Play:

=> Use the given joystick to move the plane to pass through the rings
and collect gems.
=> Use tilt controls by enabling it from settings.
=> You can change the joystick position to either left or right.

Note:

=> Each plane have it's own life chance.
=> Each plane have it's own speed depending upon the shape of plane.
=> After 100 score the rings start moving in different lines and circles.
